pt.ul.fc.di.lasige.simhs.core.domain.scheduling

Class Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pt.ul.fc.di.lasige.simhs.core.domain.scheduling.Job
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Job
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This class provides a representation of a scheduling job, as seen in most real-time scheduling theory. Regardless of the task model, a job is an activation of a parent task, with a release time, an execution requirement, and an absolute deadline. It is up to the clients of this class to use the absolute deadline as they see fit for the individual case (hard real-time, soft real-time, etc.), by (for instance) verifying (or not) deadline misses, being lax about deadline fulfilment, or initializing it with Integer.MAX_VALUE.
    Author:
    jcraveiro

    • Constructor Detail

      • Job

        public Job(IAbsSchedulable parentTask,
   int sequenceNo,
   int releaseTime,
   double capacity,
   int deadlineTime)
        Creates a new instance representing a job.
        Parameters:
        parentTask - The schedulable entity of which this job is an instance. This may not necessarily be the schedulable entity which released the job, but it is the schedulable entity whose execution will advance when this job gets dispatched.
        sequenceNo - The sequence number of this job.
        releaseTime - The instant at which this job was released.
        capacity - The initial amount of execution units left to be executed.
        deadlineTime - The absolute deadline (time instant) of this job.
